check.name: WriteTag
check.description: Requires user defined Javadoc tag to be present in Javadoc comment with defined format. To define the format for a tag, set property tagFormat to a regular expression. Property tagSeverity is used for severity of events when the tag exists. No violation reported in case there is no javadoc.

property.name: tagFormat
property.description: Specify the regexp to match tag content.

property.name: tagSeverity
property.description: Specify the severity level when tag is found and printed.
